name: Achalabharathi Public Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Achalabharathi was conceived by a group of individuals with keen interest in promoting the educational needs of children, especially the rural and under-privileged children. Pygmalion-Vanasuma, Ganita Bhaskara and Vijnana Darshana are the Projects which aims at making learning of English, Maths and Science simpler and interesting for the school kids. It is running in nearly 600 schools and helping over 50,000 kids studying in those schools.
